Change.Title: Removed itkSemaphore
Change.Author: Bradley Lowekamp
Change.Description:
itk::Semaphore has been removed and placed in the deprecated module.
The implementation contained a mixture of thread semaphores and inter-process semaphores. This gives vastly different performance characteristics across platforms.
While you can simple continue using the old class, it is strongly recommended to update to use mutexes and conditional variables. By doing so you have the potential to take advantage of ITKv4 improved threading model.
ENH: removes semaphore in favor of mutex and conditional This was the only class in ITK which utilized a semaphore. This was replaced with the equivalent mutex and conditioanl variable.
